meanings.sent1: The company plans to octuple its production by next year.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town octupled in just a decade.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally knocked over the potion, causing it to octuple in size!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement seemed to octuple as she approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The snowstorm's intensity seemed to octuple in a matter of minutes.

meanings.definition: To become eight times as much or as many
meanings.sent1: If we keep saving money, our savings will octuple in a few years.
meanings.sent2: The seeds quickly octupled in size after being planted in fertile soil.
meanings.sent3: The number of balloons at the party seemed to octuple out of nowhere!
meanings.sent4: Her happiness octupled when she received the unexpected gift.
meanings.sent5: The flames began to octuple in size, engulfing the entire building.
